Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw:



Flesh Ripper looked at the shuttle and smiled.  

The trio of Vok follow the obviously scared Cybertronian into the craft.

"You will take us to your base, and introduce us to your leader.  If you do 
not comply, we will kill you.  Understood?" Demon Wulf asked.
